summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, Cove Addition, being the Alley between Queen Anne Avenue and First Avenue North, from Crockett Street to Boston Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12948 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
